query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS faq_items (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  category VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  question TEXT NOT NULL,
  answer TEXT NOT NULL,
  keywords TEXT,
  priority INT DEFAULT 0,
  is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
  language VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT 'en',
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_faq_category (category),
  INDEX idx_faq_language (language),
  INDEX idx_faq_active (is_active)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bdzn41uM6mMWcv.97707ddd6929 --database 3gcYftfyZmb2335Uoynmho --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS faq_items (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  category VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  question TEXT NOT NULL,
  answer TEXT NOT NULL,
  keywords TEXT,
  priority INT DEFAULT 0,
  is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT true,
  language VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT 'en',
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_faq_category (category),
  INDEX idx_faq_language (language),
  INDEX idx_faq_active (is_active)
)
